io.spine.server.commandbus

Interface CommandFilter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, BusFilter<CommandEnvelope>

    public interface CommandFilter
extends BusFilter<CommandEnvelope>
    Filters commands posted to CommandBus.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface io.spine.server.bus.BusFilter

    • Method Detail

      • reject

        default java.util.Optional<io.spine.core.Ack> reject(CommandEnvelope command,
                                                     io.spine.base.RejectionThrowable cause)
        Rejects the message with a rejection status.

        This method is a shortcut which can be used in BusFilter.filter(MessageEnvelope) when the message does not pass the filter due to a business rejection.

        Such rejection method can be used when no technical error occurs but due to the business rules the command should be immediately disqualified from being executed. A typical scenario would be when the permissions of the user who made the request aren't broad enough.

        Parameters:
        command - the envelope with the message to filter
        cause - the cause of the rejection
        Returns:
        the Optional.of(Ack) signaling that the message does not pass the filter
